about_the_game:
Achievement Simulator - Save Yourself Some Time
Is the game too slow for you? Want to beat the game faster than intended? Why not buy this DLC and Save Yourself Some Time.
This DLC provides a permanent x2 speed boost while idling games, and will enable you to beat the game in almost half the time.

Features:

  • Permanent x2 Speed Boost for idling games - Beat the game in half the time!
  • Standalone DLC Achievement - 100% the DLC!

How to unlock the Standalone DLC Achievement

  • Firstly make sure you've got the DLC content ticked in your library.
  • After it's downloaded go to the game files at "Steam\steamapps\common\Achievement Simulator".
  • Open the new DLC folder "Achievement Simulator - SYST" and run "DLC Achievement Unlocker".
  • Clicking the grayed out achievement image will unlock the achievement.

    Note: If you have beaten the game already the x2 Speed Boost won't be of much use though the Standalone DLC Achievement will still be obtainable.

Is the game too slow for you? Want to beat the game faster than intended? Why not buy this DLC and Save Yourself Some Time.
This DLC provides a permanent x2 speed boost while idling games, and will enable you to beat the game in almost half the time.

Features:

  • After it's downloaded go to the game files at "Steam\steamapps\common\Achievement Simulator".

  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
